title: IFGTB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 13 Research Associate and Other Posts
description: The Institute of Forest Genetics and Tree Breeding (IFTGB Coimbatore) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 13 Research Associate- I, Project Associate- I, Junior Research Fellow, and Project Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.Sc., M. Pharm,  Ph.D., MD/MS, MDS, M.E./M. Tech, B.Sc., can apply for the IFGTB Recruitment 2025. Th...
